name: Shopping
template: customize :{Product} = enter_product_name{Sites} = Amazon, Flipkart, Google Shopping{Priority} = PriceGoal : Find the best deal for {Product} by comparing Google Shopping metadata, Amazon, and Flipkart, then add the best option to the cart.Smart Logic:1. Google Shopping Scan: Search {Product} on Google and switch to the 'Shopping' tab. Do not click the store icons immediately. Instead, scrape the 'Metadata' from the result cards (Price + Shipping Cost + Seller Rating) to establish a baseline price range.2. App Comparison: Open Amazon and Flipkart separately. Search for {Product}.3. Decision Matrix: Compare the items found across all three sources based on:   - Total Cost (Price + Shipping)   - 'Closeness' (Earliest Estimated Delivery Date)   - Seller Rating (Must be above 4 stars)4. Selection: Select the option that is the Cheapest among the ones with the fastest delivery (best value).5. Final Action: Navigate to the winning product page, add to cart, and stop at the payment screen.
